description:
A longer jacket with a vintage vibe and the kind of cozy that never goes out of style. If you have ever wish that your favourite fleece was a little longer and a little warmer, then the CO-Z Longline is for you. With the length of a longline coat and the toastiness of a Sherpa fleece, this jacket protects you from those creeping fall chills.

  • Recycled polyester gives new life to more than 20 single use plastic bottles
  • Thick sherpa fleece traps warm air, wicks away moisture, and dries quickly
  • Woven recycled nylon overlays add durability in high-wear areas
  • DWR finish on woven overlays
  • Hand pockets give you hands a place to escape the elements
  • Snap-down front placket gives you closure options
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Relaxed fit has a casual comfort and room to layer
name: Kathmandu CO-Z High Pile Longline - Women's
